AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

params._newContract: The address of the new contract to transfer the stablecoin balances to.

params._signature: that proves the Oracle's price data was provided by the owner

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._dynamicExchangePools: array of Balancer pool ids (WETH-Token pools)

params._fixedExchangeRates: array of exchage rates (price per 1 ENRG token)
array of Balancer pool ids (WETH-Token pools)

setMaxMintAmount(uint256).details: Throws if called by any account other than the energy token.

params._stableExchangePools: array of Balancer pool ids (WETH-Token pools)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

burn(uint256,address).notice: Burns the desired ENRG amount, receiving the desired payment token in exchange (if available).

getPrice(uint256,address).notice: Calculates the price for the amount of ENRG in the payment token. Can be used from any external actor to calculate the price before minting.

migrate(address).notice: Migrates the entire balance of each supported stablecoin to a new contract address. This function is intended to be used in the event of contract upgrades.

mintWithDynamic(uint256,address,uint256,.notice: Minting with dynamic exchange rate (HDAO, BAL, AAVE, etc.). Sent tokens will be exchanged for WETH and then for USDC and HDAO.

setDynamicExchangeAcceptedDeviationPerce.notice: Set the deviation percentage from the provided price and the price from Balancer.  If the deviation is higher than the provided percentage, the transaction will be reverted.

setDynamicExchangeTokens(address[],bytes.notice: Set the tokens that can be used for minting, with a dynamic exchange rate, from a Balancer pool.

setFixedExchangeRates(address[],uint256[.notice: Sets the fixed exchange rates for the tokens.

setFixedExchangeTokens(address[],uint256.notice: Set the stablecoins that can be used for minting

setMaxMintAmount(uint256).notice: Sets the amount of energy that can be minted per transaction.

setStableExchangeTokens(address[],bytes3.notice: Set the tokens that can be used for minting, with a dynamic exchange rate, from a Balancer pool.

setTrustedSigner(address).notice: Set the trusted signer address. Will be used for offline price signature verification

withdraw(address).notice: Lets the contract owner to withdraw any ERC20 token from the contract.
